content.question: In the source, Jefferson advocated most directly for the

choices.label: repeal of Virginia laws that made slavery a condition passed down through the mother
gradual emancipation of enslaved people in the United States to prevent further insurrections
removal of enslaved people engaged in rebellion to locations outside the United States
immediate expulsion of the growing free Black population from the United States to the West Indies

content.answer: removal of enslaved people engaged in rebellion to locations outside the United States

topic.text: 2.13: Resistance and Revolts in the United States
